General.Name: Derluks Yatirim Holding AS
General.Description: Derluks Yatirim Holding Anonim Sirketi engages in the manufacturing, buying, sale, import, and export of leather, textile, knitwear, and weaving products for men, women, and children. It also sells clothing accessories; and wholesales, sells, markets, and distributes water, soft drinks, alcoholic and non-alcoholic beverages, and food products. In addition, the company markets and distributes automobiles, land vehicles, electric vehicles, buses, minibuses, trucks, motorcycles, and other vehicles. Further, it operates and produces electricity from renewable sources. The company was formerly known as Derluks Yatirim Holding Anonim Sirketi. Derluks Yatirim Holding Anonim Sirketi was founded in 2002 and is headquartered in Istanbul, Turkey.
General.Address: Tarabya Mahallesi Ahi Çelebi, Istanbul, Turkey, 34020
